headline: Newcastle United Women sign Wales international Lois Joel
summary: Newcastle United have signed defender Lois Joel following the expiration of her contract with London City Lionesses this summer. The 25-year-old Wales international was named captain of London City in 2023 and previously spent two […]

headline: Manchester United Women sign Celin Bizet Ildhusøy
summary: Manchester United have signed Norway international Celin Bizet Ildhusøy from Tottenham Hotspur on a three-year contract. The 22-year-old attacker has 21 caps for her country and prior to joining Spurs, had spells with PSG and […]

headline: Brazil and Colombia win again at FIFA U-20 Women’s World Cup
summary: Brazil and hosts Colombia both have two wins from two games in the FIFA U-20 Women’s World Cup group stage. Group A: Mexico 2-0 Australia, Colombia 1-0 Cameroon Group B: France 0-3 Brazil, Canada 9-0 […]

headline: Ballymoney United Ladies lift NIWFA Division 1 Cup
summary: There were NIWFA Divisional Cup wins for Ballymoney United Ladies, Strabane Athletic, Lisbellaw United and Greenisland Reserves. Ballymoney United Ladies lifted the Division 1 Cup after defeating Greenisland 2-0, with a goal in either half. […]

headline: Big wins for Japan and North Korea at U-20 Women’s World Cup
summary: North Korea hit Argentina for six and Japan sunk New Zealand 7-0 at the FIFA U-20 Women’s World Cup in Colombia. Group E: Ghana 1-2 Austria, Japan 7-0 New Zealand Group F: North Korea 6-2 […]

headline: Newcastle United Women sign defender Isabella Sibley on loan
summary: Newcastle United have signed Isabella Sibley on a season-long loan deal from Crystal Palace, whom she helped win the Championship last season. Sibley told nufc.co.uk: “I’m delighted to have got this signed, sealed and delivered […]
